name: Revenge of the Flashplayer
description:
Made for the Blackthornprod game jam #3 in a few evenings without using a game engine. Theme: "less is more". Less gameplay more fun.

It's a flash style choose your own adventure, just like in the good old days! I am not picking any favorites, but just so you know all this is made in html5.

You can go fullscreen and adjust size with ctrl + and ctrl -

It works in Browser, but you can download everything and play offline if you happen to have slow internet.

Animations were made in Synfig Studio. Editing software was OpenShot.

Sadly I didn't have time to make the sound, so it is all silent.
